name: Chess Valley 2
description:
As chess valley had a good acceptance i decided to continue the game and create chess valey 2

The objective of the game is simple, the player must try to cross the board by deflecting the enemy pieces to join his team.

In this game the player will find 50 new stages that now have twice the size of the original board and to be able to use a little more strategy the player can mark the path on the board where you should or should not go.

It's a new experience, I believe whoever played the first game will enjoy chess valley 2.

The controls are simple and easy, basically the player control the king pressing WASD, the player also change the cam pressing C on keyboard and with the left mouse click mark the squares where you should or should not go.
